content: super simple shawl pattern materials yarn 10 -16 0zs yarn of choice i have used red hearts worsted weight and joann s rainbow boucle and both worked up well i skein of novelty yarn such as patons allure bernats fun fur prints or the like in cordinating color hook size k abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet dtr = treble_crochet cluster = cluster stitch p = picot st = stitch lp = loop skip = skip space = space decrease = together yo = wrap yarn over hook round = round decrease = decrease increase increase mc = main color cc = contrasting color repeat = repeat = repeat between as indicated * repeat from as indicated bsc = beaded single croche shawl row 1 chain 2 2 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook leaving 1 lp on hook for each stitch 3 lps on hook yo and draw through all the lps cluster made *chain 2 3 double_crochet in the same st as 1st cluster leaving 1 lp on hook for each stitch 4 lps on hook yo and draw through all the lps * cluster made repeat from * to * till you have 5 clusters total chain 3 turn row 2 single_crochet in chain 2 lp chain 2 single_crochet in same lp * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 lp chain 2 single_crochet in same lp * repeat from * to * to end of row chain 3 single_crochet in top of cluster chain 5 turn row 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp 2 times chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp 2 times chain 1 treble_crochet in same lp chain 5 turn row 4 1 double_crochet in chain 1 space * double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in chain 2 lp in * repeat from * to * to end of row ending with double_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet in space created by the chain 5 turn of previous row chain 5 turn row 5 2 double_crochet in chain 2 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp * 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp * repeat from * to * to center v st 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp 2 times chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp ** 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 lp chain 2 2 double_crochet in same lp ** repeat from ** to ** to end of row ending with chain 1 treble_crochet in same lp chain 5 turn row 6 - 0n repeat row 4 and 5 till desired size ending
